verses.verse: וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <WH6950> vai-yik-Ka-ha-Lu assembled together כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat And the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> shi-Loh, at Shiloh וַיַּשְׁכִּ֥ינוּ <WH7931> vai-yash-Ki-nu and set up שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham there אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz there And the land נִכְבְּשָׁ֖ה <WH3533> nich-be-Shah was subdued לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem. before

וַיִּוָּֽתְרוּ֙ <WH3498> vai-yiv-va-te-Ru And there remained בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> biv-Nei among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- had not חָלְק֖וּ <WH2505> chal-Ku which had not yet received אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam; their inheritance שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah seven שְׁבָטִֽים׃ <WH7626> she-va-Tim. tribes

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- long אָ֙נָה֙ <WH575> 'a-nah How אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> 'at-Tem will you מִתְרַפִּ֔ים <WH7503> mit-rap-Pim, How long [are] ye slack לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> la-Vo to go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> na-Tan hath given לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> a-Vo-tei-Chem. of your fathers

הָב֥וּ <WH3051> ha-Vu Give out לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah from among you three אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim men לַשָּׁ֑בֶט <WH7626> lash-Sha-vet; for [each] tribe וְאֶשְׁלָחֵ֗ם <WH7971> ve-'esh-la-Chem, and I will send וְיָקֻ֜מוּ <WH6965> ve-ya-Ku-mu them and they shall rise וְיִֽתְהַלְּכ֥וּ <WH1980> ve-yit-hal-le-Chu and go בָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz through the land וְיִכְתְּב֥וּ <WH3789> ve-yich-te-Vu and describe אוֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> o-Tah לְפִ֥י <WH6310> le-Fi it according נַֽחֲלָתָ֖ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam to the inheritance וְיָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> ve-ya-Vo-'u of them and they shall come אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. about

וְהִֽתְחַלְּק֥וּ <WH2505> ve-hit-chal-le-Ku And they shall divide אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah לְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> le-shiv-'Ah it into seven חֲלָקִ֑ים <WH2506> cha-la-Kim; parts יְהוּדָ֞ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah יַעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> ya-'a-Mod shall abide עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and גְּבוּלוֹ֙ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lo in their coast מִנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev, on the south וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> u-Veit and the house יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> yo-Sef of Joseph יַעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> ya-'am-Du shall abide עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in גְּבוּלָ֖ם <WH1366> ge-vu-Lam in their coasts מִצָּפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fon. on the north

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem You תִּכְתְּב֤וּ <WH3789> tich-te-Vu Ye shall therefore describe אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land שִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah [into] seven חֲלָקִ֔ים <WH2506> cha-la-Kim, parts וַֽהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <WH935> va-ha-ve-Tem and bring אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai to הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> Hen-nah; here וְיָרִ֨יתִי <WH3384> ve-ya-Ri-ti [the description] hither to me that I may cast לָכֶ֤ם la-Chem גּוֹרָל֙ <WH1486> go-Ral lots פֹּ֔ה <WH6311> Poh, here לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei for you here before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God

כִּ֠י <WH3588> ki because אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- have חֵ֤לֶק <WH2506> Che-lek have no part לַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim But the Levites בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֔ם <WH7130> be-kir-be-Chem, among כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because כְהֻנַּ֥ת <WH3550> che-hun-Nat you for the priesthood יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <WH5159> na-cha-la-To; [is] their inheritance וְגָ֡ד <WH1410> ve-Gad and Gad וּרְאוּבֵ֡ן <WH7205> u-re-'u-Ven and Reuben וַחֲצִי֩ <WH2677> va-cha-Tzi and half שֵׁ֨בֶט <WH7626> She-vet the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> ham-nash-Sheh of Manasseh לָקְח֣וּ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <WH5159> na-cha-la-Tam, their inheritance מֵעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver beyond לַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> lai-yar-Den Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah, on the east אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> na-Tan gave לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh which Moses עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיָּקֻ֥מוּ <WH6965> vai-ya-Ku-mu arose הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim And the men וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> vai-ye-Le-chu; them that went וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav charged יְהוֹשֻׁ֡עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַהֹלְכִים֩ <WH1980> ha-ho-le-Chim and walk לִכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> lich-To to describe אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying לְ֠כוּ <WH1980> Le-chu Go וְהִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <WH1980> ve-hit-hal-le-Chu and walk בָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz through the land וְכִתְב֤וּ <WH3789> ve-chit-Vu and describe אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> o-Tah וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> ve-Shu-vu it and come again אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, for וּ֠פֹה <WH6311> U-foh here אַשְׁלִ֨יךְ <WH7993> 'ash-Lich to me that I may here cast לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem גּוֹרָ֛ל <WH1486> go-Ral lots לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei for you before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּשִׁלֹֽה׃ <WH7887> be-shi-Loh. in Shiloh

וַיֵּלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu went הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim And the men וַיַּעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> vai-ya-'av-Ru and passed through בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz, the land וַיִּכְתְּב֧וּהָ <WH3789> vai-yich-te-Vu-ha and described לֶֽעָרִ֛ים <WH5892> le-'a-Rim it by cities לְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> le-shiv-'Ah into seven חֲלָקִ֖ים <WH2506> cha-la-Kim parts עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in סֵ֑פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer; in a book וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' [again] to Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh to the host שִׁלֹֽה׃ <WH7887> shi-Loh. at Shiloh

וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֩ <WH7993> vai-yash-leCh cast לָהֶ֨ם la-Hem יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua גּוֹרָ֛ל <WH1486> go-Ral lots בְּשִׁלֹ֖ה <WH7887> be-shi-Loh for them in Shiloh לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיְחַלֶּק־ <WH2505> vay-chal-lek- divided שָׁ֨ם <WH8033> sham and there יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' and there Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <WH4256> ke-mach-le-ko-Tam. according to their divisions פ Peh

וַיַּ֗עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al, came up גּוֹרַ֛ל <WH1486> go-Ral And the lot מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> vai-ye-Tze came forth גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul and the coast גּֽוֹרָלָ֔ם <WH1486> go-ra-Lam, of their lot בֵּ֚ין <WH996> bein between בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei between the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> u-Vein between בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei and the children יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> yo-Sef. of Joseph

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> vay-Hi become לָהֶ֧ם la-Hem הַגְּב֛וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And their border לִפְאַ֥ת <WH6285> lif-'At side צָפ֖וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah on the north מִן־ <WH4480> min- was from הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den; was from Jordan וְעָלָ֣ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּבוּל֩ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כֶּ֨תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef to the side יְרִיח֜וֹ <WH3405> ye-ri-Cho of Jericho מִצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fon, on the north וְעָלָ֤ה <WH5927> ve-'a-Lah side and went up בָהָר֙ <WH2022> va-Har through the mountains יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah, westward; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become קתֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <WH8444> to-tze-'o-Tav, and the goings out מִדְבַּ֖רָה <WH4057> mid-Ba-rah thereof were at the wilderness בֵּ֥ית beit אָֽוֶן׃ <WH1007> 'A-ven. of Bethaven

וְעָבַר֩ <WH5674> ve-'a-Var went over מִשָּׁ֨ם <WH8033> mish-Sham there הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border ל֗וּזָה <WH3870> Lu-zah, from thence toward Luz אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef to the side ל֙וּזָה֙ <WH3870> lu-zah of Luz נֶ֔גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah, southward הִ֖יא <WH1931> hi he בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <WH1008> 'El; which [is] Bethel וְיָרַ֤ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad descended הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border עַטְר֣וֹת at-Rot אַדָּ֔ר <WH5853> 'ad-Dar, to Atarothadar עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- near הָהָ֕ר <WH2022> ha-Har near the hill אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִנֶּ֥גֶב <WH5045> min-Ne-gev that [lieth] on the south side לְבֵית־ le-veit- חֹר֖וֹן <WH1032> cho-Ron Bethhoron תַּחְתּֽוֹן׃ <WH8481> tach-Ton. of the nether

וְתָאַ֣ר <WH8388> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּבוּל֩ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border וְנָסַ֨ב <WH5437> ve-na-Sav [thence] and compassed לִפְאַת־ <WH6285> lif-'at- the corner יָ֜ם <WH3220> yam of the sea נֶ֗גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah, southward מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָהָר֙ <WH2022> ha-Har from the hill אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei that [lieth] before בֵית־ veit- חֹרוֹן֮ <WH1032> cho-rOn Bethhoron נֶגְבָּה֒ <WH5045> neg-Bah southward; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu become קתֹֽצְאֹתָ֗יו <WH8444> to-tze-'o-Tav, and the goings out אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- בַּ֙עַל֙ <WH7154> ba-'al thereof were at Kirjathbaal הִ֚יא <WH1931> hi he קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat יְעָרִ֔ים <WH7157> ye-'a-Rim, which [is] Kirjathjearim עִ֖יר <WH5892> 'ir a city בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah זֹ֖את <WH2063> zot likewise פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- quarter יָֽם׃ <WH3220> Yam. this [was] the west

וּפְאַת־ <WH6285> u-fe-'at- quarter נֶ֕גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah And the south מִקְצֵ֖ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh [was] from the end קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat יְעָרִ֑ים <WH7157> ye-'a-Rim; of Kirjathjearim וְיָצָ֤א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza went out הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul and the border יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah, on the west וְיָצָ֕א <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and went out אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מַעְיַ֖ן <WH4599> ma'-Yan to the well מֵ֥י <WH4325> mei of waters נֶפְתּֽוֹחַ׃ <WH5318> nef-To-ach. of Nephtoah

וְיָרַ֨ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad came down הַגְּב֜וּל <WH1366> hag-ge-Vul And the border אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to קְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> ke-Tzeh to the end הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> ha-Har, of the mountain אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- that פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> pe-Nei that [lieth] before גֵּ֣י <WH1516> gei the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <WH2011> hin-Nom, of Hinnom אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> be-'E-mek [and] which [is] in the valley רְפָאִ֖ים <WH7497> re-fa-'Im of the giants צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah; on the north וְיָרַד֩ <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad and descended גֵּ֨י <WH1516> gei to the valley הִנֹּ֜ם <WH2011> hin-Nom of Hinnom אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef to the side הַיְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> hay-vu-Si of Jebusi נֶ֔גְבָּה <WH5045> Neg-bah, on the south וְיָרַ֖ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad and descended עֵ֥ין 'ein רֹגֵֽל׃ <WH5883> ro-Gel. to Enrogel

וְתָאַ֣ר <WH8388> ve-ta-'Ar And was drawn מִצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fon, from the north וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and went forth עֵ֣ין 'ein שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH5885> She-mesh, to Enshemesh וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> ve-ya-Tza and went forth אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גְּלִיל֔וֹת <WH1553> ge-li-Lot, toward Geliloth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> No-chach which [is] over against מַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4608> ma-'a-Leh the going up אֲדֻמִּ֑ים <WH131> 'a-dum-Mim; of Adummim וְיָרַ֕ד <WH3381> ve-ya-Rad and descended אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven to the stone בֹּ֖הַן <WH932> Bo-han of Bohan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> re-'u-Ven. of Reuben
